node.doctext:
This is the Mentoring Clearinghouse, message group for the [E2 mentoring sign-up] maintainers. Our activities are logged at the [mentor log], of course.

Past members: [ideath], [graceness], [dann], [yclept], [LaggedyAnne], [alex]

Membership in this group is available only to admins and editors, and is by invitation only. Invitations are extended by the current members whenever they believe that more staff is needed.
node.title: mch
